title: larger memory consumption and slower running when installing from source
body_html:
I install pytorch from source according to the tutorial, but larger gpu memory consumption and slower running than installing from binaries.
Details:
From source: can run 9 batches, 35 seconds every 20 iterations of training
From binaries: can run 12 batches, 22 seconds every 20 iterations of training
Why the speed and memory consumption has such a big difference?
ps:
Environment:
ubuntu 14.04, TITAN X, cuda 8.0, cudnn v6
